H0.text: Zloty and Grosz are money in which country. Czech Republic

H1.text: Zloty and Grosz are money in which country. Slovakia

H2.text: Zloty and Grosz are money in which country. Hungary

H3.text: Zloty and Grosz are money in which country. Polnd

A4.text: The złoty (alternative spelling: zloty; Polish: polski złoty, Polish: [ˈzwɔtɨ] ; abbreviation: zł; code: PLN, English: golden) is the official currency and legal tender of Poland.
